# Class fields AI.PromptDB.Code.PromptDBClass_title1=Title AI.PromptDB.Code.PromptDBClass_longText1=Description AI.PromptDB.Code.PromptDBClass_boolean1=active AI.PromptDB.Code.PromptDBClass_content1=Prompt AI.PromptDB.Code.PromptDBClass_default=Default
# Sheet keys promptdb.sheet.description=This page controls how AI Prompt Database pages are displayed in both view and edit modes. promptdb.sheet.noObject=The current page doesn't have the expected AI Prompt Database object. promptdb.sheet.noFields=The AI Prompt Database application doesn't have any fields to display.
# Live table generic keys promptdb.livetable.doc.title=Page Title promptdb.livetable.doc.name=Page Name promptdb.livetable.doc.space=Space promptdb.livetable.doc.fullname=Page full name promptdb.livetable.doc.location=Location promptdb.livetable.doc.author=Last Author promptdb.livetable.doc.creator=Creator promptdb.livetable.doc.date=Date promptdb.livetable.doc.creationDate=Creation Date promptdb.livetable._avatar=Avatar promptdb.livetable._images=Images promptdb.livetable._attachments=Attachments promptdb.livetable._actions=Actions promptdb.livetable._actions.edit=Edit promptdb.livetable._actions.delete=Delete promptdb.livetable.emptyvalue=-
# Live table specific keys promptdb.livetable.title1=Title promptdb.livetable.longText1=Description promptdb.livetable.boolean1=active promptdb.livetable.content1=Prompt promptdb.livetable.default=Default
